channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 保险费率不断上涨，保险范围被削减，保单被取消。这可能是加州最糟糕的文职工作了。
item.description:
Insurance rates are going up, coverage has been cut, and policies have been canceled. This might be the worst desk job in California. https://t.co/laBDUWY1Bm https://t.co/laBDUWY1Bm

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统的健康状况基本没有问题，但他的许多前任也是如此
item.description:
President Biden received a mostly clean assessment of his well-being, but so have many of his predecessors https://t.co/pqBq1xX9kO https://t.co/pqBq1xX9kO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 你在杂货店买东西时可以穿得更时髦。这里有八套服装供您参考。
item.description:
Your bodega run could look a lot more stylish. Here, eight outfits for some inspiration. https://t.co/cEnzDYQrVP https://t.co/cEnzDYQrVP

item.title: 法根鲍姆博士患有一种罕见疾病，差点要了他的命。他发现了一种血癌药物，使他的病情得以缓解。现在，他正试图帮助其他人找到他们的神奇药物。
item.description:
Dr. Fajgenbaum has a rare disease that almost killed him. He discovered a blood-cancer drug that has kept him in remission. Now he’s trying to help others find their miracle drugs. https://t.co/Uu2MfyWBGt https://t.co/Uu2MfyWBGt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 重大消息：立法者达成协议，使政府在周五之后继续全面运转，届时一些机构的资金将被取消
item.description:
Breaking: Lawmakers reached a deal to keep the government fully operating beyond Friday, when funding is scheduled to lapse for some agencies https://t.co/lbVMvoGJgr https://t.co/lbVMvoGJgr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：以色列自 10 月 7 日以来最大的失败是政治失败。@sethcropsey 写道：世界上大多数国家都认为这次屠杀是另一轮以巴暴力，而不是伊朗策划的袭击。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Israel’s greatest failure since Oct. 7 is political. Much of the world considers the massacre another round of Israeli-Palestinian violence, not an Iran-orchestrated attack, writes @sethcropsey. https://t.co/dAX8as93Yq

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）计划在重组中裁员约 5%，以减少不动产面积并调整投资组合
item.description:
Electronic Arts plans to cut about 5% of its workforce in a restructuring as it looks to reduce its real-estate footprint and modify its portfolio https://t.co/7qrPyyZeUc https://t.co/7qrPyyZeUc

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息最高法院同意考虑唐纳德-特朗普是否必须就其阴谋推翻 2020 年大选的指控接受审判
item.description:
Breaking: The Supreme Court agreed to consider whether Donald Trump must stand trial on charges he plotted to overturn the 2020 election https://t.co/KJtaHncr4g https://t.co/KJtaHncr4g

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：威廉-加尔斯顿写道：如果国会不能在特朗普就职典礼前修复《叛乱法》，军队可能会镇压抗议活动，从而开始第二任期。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: If Congress fails to fix the Insurrection Act before a Trump inauguration, troops could crush protests to begin a second term, writes William Galston https://t.co/OSd0Q1rN6m

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 这座森林小屋的设计方案既有大卫-林奇（David Lynch）笔下虚构山城双峰镇的阴郁氛围，又有家庭度假的欢乐气氛。这可不是夏令营。
item.description:
This forest cabin's design scheme balances the brooding atmosphere of David Lynch’s fictitious mountain town, Twin Peaks, with the glee of a family getaway. Summer camp this isn't. https://t.co/W0ub3u860h https://t.co/W0ub3u860h

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@Judy__Stecker写道：科学发展的步伐正在加快，但如果监管部门跟不上，患有罕见病的人们就无法看到这种进步。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The pace of science is accelerating, but people struggling with rare diseases won’t see that progress if the regulatory state can’t keep up, writes @Judy__Stecker https://t.co/9ioO1tyxHy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：美国的大学应该考虑对那些试图孤立以色列的外国大学进行反抵制。@BrekkeTorkel写道，挪威将是一个很好的开始。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Universities in the U.S. should consider setting up counter-boycotts against foreign universities that attempt to isolate Israel. Norway would be a great place to start, writes @BrekkeTorkel. https://t.co/CxZzVVdKsI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: "我们围绕家具建造房子"。位于沙漠中的房屋占地 4000 平方英尺，有 3 个卧室，其设计目的是为了容纳屋主自己制作的家具和物品。
item.description:
“We built the house around the furniture.” A 4,000-square-foot, 3-bedroom home in the desert was designed to accommodate furniture and objects made by the owners. https://t.co/EawMQkVYs8 https://t.co/EawMQkVYs8

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 温迪在收到咸味反馈后不会提高午餐汉堡的价格

Wendy’s won’t be beefing up the price of a lunchtime burger after getting salty feedback https://t.co/BF5t8rZckW https://t.co/BF5t8rZckW

item.title: Interparfums 首席执行官表示，在地缘政治局势持续紧张、中国市场缺乏能见度的情况下，公司对今年的前景持保守态度，但正在招聘人员，以继续发展业务。
item.description:
Interparfums' CEO said the company is being conservative about its outlook for the year amid continuing geopolitical tensions and a lack of visibility in China but is in a hiring mode to continue growing the business https://t.co/YUnScO8IYK https://t.co/YUnScO8IYK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: Essence 正在洽谈收购 Vice Media 旗下的 Refinery29，这笔交易将帮助这个黑人媒体品牌扩大其数字形象，并接触到更多年轻女性。
item.description:
Essence is in talks to acquire Vice Media’s Refinery29, a deal that could help the Black-owned media brand expand its digital profile and reach more young women https://t.co/ho30rxXb7j https://t.co/ho30rxXb7j

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 汽车人 "曾警告苹果公司，金属撞击业务可能是一场艰难的低利润游戏。本周，苹果的梦想破灭了，@timkhiggins 写道。
item.description:
The Car Guys warned Apple that the metal-bashing business could be a tough, low-margin game. But nobody wanted to listen to a bunch of dinosaurs from Detroit.

This week, Apple's dream died, writes @timkhiggins. https://t.co/pqu0c5Pibk https://t.co/pqu0c5Pibk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 由于软件故障，周三全国数千家沃尔玛商店暂时无法处理许多交易
item.description:
Thousands of Walmart stores nationwide were temporarily unable to process many transactions Wednesday after a software glitch https://t.co/7XtYkgIM20 https://t.co/7XtYkgIM20

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 为联邦政府提供建议的疫苗专家说，65 岁及以上的美国人应在今年春季接种 Covid 强化疫苗，他们使用的措辞比卫生部门去年选择的措辞更强硬
item.description:
Americans 65 years and older should get a Covid booster this spring, vaccine experts advising the federal government said, using stronger language than health authorities chose last year https://t.co/dlDcwRYanv https://t.co/dlDcwRYanv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：霍尔曼-詹金斯（Holman Jenkins）写道：俄罗斯失去纳瓦尔尼的悲剧在于失去了最有可能将俄罗斯从后普京时代的混乱中拯救出来的人物
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Russia’s tragedy in losing Navalny was its loss of the figure most likely to rescue the Russian state from post-Putin chaos, writes Holman Jenkins https://t.co/d2ouEwJhAI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 纽约阿尔伯特-爱因斯坦医学院的学生们在得知他们的学费将由一笔历史性的 10 亿美元捐款全额支付后欢呼雀跃
item.description:
Students at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine in New York cheered after finding out their tuition will be fully covered by a historic $1 billion donation https://t.co/G0MXBRQe7T pic.twitter.com/e3GAi8Wake

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 欧洲多家媒体机构向谷歌提起价值 22.8 亿美元的诉讼，称谷歌在广告市场的地位损害了他们的业务。
item.description:
Google was hit with a $2.28 billion lawsuit by a group of European media organizations, who are alleging Google’s position in the advertising market harmed their business https://t.co/BOI32tTMfi https://t.co/BOI32tTMfi

item.title: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，该公司打算明年开始交付拖延已久的Roadster跑车，这是随着电动汽车领域竞争加剧，该公司试图为品牌注入新活力的最新迹象。
item.description:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the company intends to start shipping its long-delayed Roadster sports car next year, the latest sign it is trying to inject new buzz into the brand as competition intensifies in the electric-vehicle space https://t.co/LNNSa1uMOo https://t.co/LNNSa1uMOo

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 纽约的顶级律师正在起诉 JBS，指控这家全球最大的肉类包装商在其对环境的影响方面撒了谎，以赢得具有气候意识的客户的青睐。
item.description:
New York’s top lawyer is taking on JBS, alleging that the world’s largest meatpacker lied about its impact on the environment to win over climate-conscious customers https://t.co/0npvftuwTZ https://t.co/0npvftuwTZ

item.title: 进步明星凯蒂-波特（Katie Porter）的政治生存取决于能否在加利福尼亚州参议员公开初选中获得第二名

item.title: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）表示，在 2023 年盈利增长后，作为战略重新设计的一部分，公司计划削减成本并裁减员工。
item.description:
Universal Music Group said it plans to cuts costs and reduce headcount as part of a strategic redesign after earnings increased in 2023 https://t.co/ofLXMY2Dbk https://t.co/ofLXMY2Dbk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 重大新闻：参议院少数党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）是参议院历史上任职时间最长的党魁，他表示将在近二十年后的十一月卸任领导职务
item.description:
Breaking: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, the longest-serving Senate party leader in history, said he will step down from his leadership role in November after almost two decades https://t.co/3VHSyPTBYD https://t.co/3VHSyPTBYD

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: @JoannaStern 写道："一个月以来，苹果 Vision Pro 最棒的地方并不是新的应用程序，而是逃离恼人的环境：飞机中间的座位、拥挤的通勤环境、真人秀节目......"。
item.description:
A month in, the best thing about Apple Vision Pro isn’t a new app, writes @JoannaStern, but an escape from annoying situations: an airplane middle seat, a crowded commute, a reality-TV show https://t.co/j0JMdKGbvS https://t.co/j0JMdKGbvS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024
